00020 #define getTimerPrescale(TxCONbits) getTimerPrescaleBits(TxCONbits.TCKPS)
00021 
00022 #define MS_TO_TICKS(ms, pre) ((FCY/1000L/(pre))*ms)
00023 uint16 msToU16Ticks(uint16 u16_ms, uint16 u16_pre);
00024 uint16 usToU16Ticks(uint16 u16_us, uint16 u16_pre);
00025 uint32 usToU32Ticks(uint32 u32_us, uint16 u16_pre);
00026 uint16 getTimerPrescaleBits(uint8 u8_TCKPS);
00027 uint32 ticksToMs (uint32 u32_ticks, uint16 u16_tmrPre);
00028 uint32 ticksToUs (uint32 u32_ticks, uint16 u16_tmrPre);
00029 uint32 ticksToNs (uint32 u32_ticks, uint16 u16_tmrPre);
00030 uint32 computeDeltaTicksLong(uint16 u16_start, uint16 u16_end, uint16 u16_tmrPR, uint16 u16_oflows);
00031 uint16 computeDeltaTicks(uint16 u16_start, uint16 u16_end, uint16 u16_tmrPR);

00033 /*
00034 The following macros are a subset of the AND/OR macros found in the
00035 the MPLAB C30/src/peripheral_24F/timer.h file and placed
00036 in this header for use solely and exclusively on Microchip
00037 PICmicro Microcontroller products as
00038 specified in the MPLAB C30/src/peripheral_24F/timer.h header.
00039 
00040 Edits have been made in the comments to correct some
00041 minor typos.
00042 */
00043 
00044 /* T1CON: TIMER1 CONTROL REGISTER */
00045 #define T1_ON               0x8000 /* Timer1 ON */
00046 #define T1_OFF              0x0000 /* Timer1 OFF */
00047 #define T1_OFF_ON_MASK      (~T1_ON)
00048 
00049 #define T1_IDLE_STOP        0x2000 /* stop operation during sleep */
00050 #define T1_IDLE_CON         0x0000 /* operate during sleep */
00051 #define T1_IDLE_MASK        (~T1_IDLE_STOP)
00052 
00053 #define T1_GATE_ON          0x0040 /* Timer Gate time accumulation enabled */
00054 #define T1_GATE_OFF         0x0000 /* Timer Gate time accumulation disabled */
00055 #define T1_GATE_MASK        (~T1_GATE_ON)
00056 
00057 #define T1_PS_1_1           0x0000 /* Prescaler 1:1 */
00058 #define T1_PS_1_8           0x0010 /*           1:8 */
00059 #define T1_PS_1_64          0x0020 /*          1:64 */
00060 #define T1_PS_1_256         0x0030 /*         1:256 */
00061 #define T1_PS_MASK          (~T1_PS_1_256)
00062 
00063 #define T1_SYNC_EXT_ON      0x0004 /* Synch external clk input */
00064 #define T1_SYNC_EXT_OFF     0x0000 /* Do not synch external clk input */
00065 #define T1_SYNC_EXT_MASK    (~T1_SYNC_EXT_ON)
00066 
00067 #define T1_SOURCE_EXT       0x0002 /* External clock source */
00068 #define T1_SOURCE_INT       0x0000 /* Internal clock source */
00069 #define T1_SOURCE_MASK      (~T1_SOURCE_EXT)
00070

00075 #define T2_OFF_ON_MASK      (~T2_ON)

00089 #define T2_PS_MASK          (~T2_PS_1_256)
00090

00092 #define T2_32BIT_MODE_OFF   0x0000
00093 #define T2_32BIT_MODE_MASK   (~T2_32BIT_MODE_ON)
00094

00287 //Input Capture macros
00288 
00289 /*
00290 The following macros are a subset of the AND/OR macros found in the
00291 the MPLAB C30/src/peripheral_24F/incap.h file and placed
00292 in this header for use solely and exclusively on Microchip
00293 PICmicro Microcontroller products as
00294 specified in the MPLAB C30/src/peripheral_24F/incap.h header.
00295 */
00296 
00297 #define IC_IDLE_STOP            0x2000 /* IC stop in sleep mode */
00298 #define IC_IDLE_CON             0x0000 /* IC operate in sleep mode */
00299 #define IC_IDLE_MASK            (~IC_IDLE_STOP)
00300 
00301 #define IC_TIMER2_SRC           0x0080 /* Timer2 is the clock source for Capture */
00302 #define IC_TIMER3_SRC           0x0000 /* Timer3 is the clock source for Capture */
00303 #define IC_TIMER_SRC_MASK       (~IC_TIMER2_SRC)
00304 
00305 #define IC_INT_4CAPTURE         0x0060  /* Interrupt on fourth Capture*/
00306 #define IC_INT_3CAPTURE         0x0040 /* Interrupt on third Capture */
00307 #define IC_INT_2CAPTURE         0x0020 /* Interrupt on second Capture*/
00308 #define IC_INT_1CAPTURE         0x0000 /* Interrupt on first Capture */
00309 #define IC_INT_CAPTURE_MASK     (~IC_INT_4CAPTURE)
00310 
00311 #define IC_INTERRUPT            0x0007 /* Interrupt pin only in CPU sleep and idle mode */
00312 #define IC_EVERY_16_RISE_EDGE   0x0005 /* Every 16th rising edge */
00313 #define IC_EVERY_4_RISE_EDGE    0x0004 /* Every 4th rising edge  */
00314 #define IC_EVERY_RISE_EDGE      0x0003 /* Every rising edge      */
00315 #define IC_EVERY_FALL_EDGE      0x0002 /* Every falling edge      */
00316 #define IC_EVERY_EDGE           0x0001 /* Every rising/falling edge */
00317 #define IC_INPUTCAP_OFF         0x0000 /* Input Capture Off      */
00318 #define IC_CAPTURE_MODE_MASK    (~IC_INTERRUPT)
00319 
00320 //Output Compare macros
00321 
00322 /*
00323 The following macros are a subset of the AND/OR macros found in the
00324 the MPLAB C30/src/peripheral_24F/outcompare.h file and placed
00325 in this header for use solely and exclusively on Microchip
00326 PICmicro Microcontroller products as
00327 specified in the MPLAB C30/src/peripheral_24F/outcompare.h header.
00328 */
00329 
00330 /* Section : Output Compare Stop in Idle mode Bit defines */
00331 #define OC_IDLE_CON                0x0000 /*  continue operation in idle mode */
00332 #define OC_IDLE_STOP               0x2000 /* stop in idle mode */
00333 #define OC_IDLE_MASK               (~OC_IDLE_STOP)
00334 
00335 /*Section :  Output Compare timer select Bit Defines */
00336 #define OC_TIMER2_SRC               0x0000 /* Timer2 is the clock source for OutputCompare */
00337 #define OC_TIMER3_SRC               0x0008 /* Timer3 is the clock source for OutputCompare */
00338 #define OC_TIMER_SRC_MASK           (~OC_TIMER3_SRC)
00339 
00340 #define OC_PWM_FAULT_PIN_ENABLE     0x0007 /* PWM Mode on OCx, fault pin enabled, (TxIF bit is set for PWM, OCxIF is set for fault)*/
00341 #define OC_PWM_FAULT_PIN_DISABLE    0x0006 /* PWM Mode on OCx, fault pin disabled */
00342 #define OC_CONTINUE_PULSE           0x0005 /* Generates Continuous Output pulse on OCx Pin */
00343 #define OC_SINGLE_PULSE             0x0004 /* Generates Single Output pulse on OCx Pin */
00344 #define OC_TOGGLE_PULSE             0x0003 /* Compare1 toggles  OCx pin*/
00345 #define OC_HIGH_LOW                 0x0002 /* Compare1 forces   OCx pin Low*/
00346 #define OC_LOW_HIGH                 0x0001 /* Compare1 forces  OCx pin High*/
00347 #define OC_OFF                      0x0000 /* OutputCompare x Off*/
00348 #define OC_PWM_MODE_MASK            (~OC_PWM_FAULT_PIN_ENABLE)
00349 
00350 
00351 #endif
